title: Willie Robertson Has a Cheeky Nickname for His New Son-in-Law
description:
Willie's youngest daughter, Bella, is officially married, and Willie reveals his nickname for her new husband. Uncle Si tells the story of the time he wore skunk-sprayed sneakers to a basketball game — on purpose. Willie drinks Si's tea for the very first time. Si misses Willie singing Hall and Oates at Bella's wedding. Willie acknowledges the healing power of shorty shorts, but he's torn on whether to embrace the trend in 2021. Martin explains why booty shorts violate his fashion rules, and Stone and Si won't wear shorts, period. Willie shares his nicknames for his grandkids and admits Sadie has already banned one potential nickname for her daughter. And a fan tries to get Willie in trouble with a question about wives who won't cook.
